data.event: Silicon Valley's largest water supplier voted unanimously today to call for mandatory rationing, asking residents and businesses to cut back 15 percent this summer.

event.title: comes after three consecutive dry years

data.event: The move comes after three consecutive dry years.

event.title: late May, the city of San Jose will vote

data.event: In late May, the city of San Jose will vote on its ordinance, which would take effect in June.
City officials said today they were unsure if that would include fines.

event.title: February rains, large reservoirs that feed

data.event: Despite February rains, large reservoirs that feed the delta are only half full from two dry years.
